info.partie1: You can select up to 20 commands without additional fees. Beyond 20, an extra charge of €1 will be applied for every 3 additional commands.
info.partie2: Custom commands are subject to an additional charge of €2 each. Please note that extra time may be required to process custom commands.
info.partie3: Payment is made via PayPal. An email containing the payment link will be sent to you.

delay: The delivery time for the bot is estimated at 3 business days.

error.error_submit: An error occurred while submitting the command. Please try again later.

success.success_submit: Your command has been successfully submitted. An email containing the payment link will be sent to you shortly.
success.success_command: Your command has been successfully submitted.
